BasicInfo.short: GameLayers develops massively multiplayer online games (MMOG) integrated with web surfing.

Products.name: PMOG
Products.description: PMOG, which stands for Passively Multiplayer Online Game, is a Firefox extension that turns web browsing into a multiplayer online game.
